analyzed: tad ardham abhyasya aparasmin tṛtīye ṣaṣ bhāga ūne lakṣaṇam karoti

original: pṛṣṭhyāntayorantau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimitaṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_1.2c //
analyzed: pṛṣṭhya antayoḥ antau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇā apāyamya nimitam karoti
evam uttaratas viparyasya itaratas sa samādhiḥ
āyāmam vā abhyasya āgantu caturtham āyāmaḥ ca akṣṇayā rajjuḥ tiryak bhānī śeṣaḥ

original: dīrghasyākṣṇayārajjuḥ pārśvamānī tiryaṅmānī ca yat pṛthagbhute kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_1.4a //
analyzed: dīrghasya akṣṇayā rajjuḥ pārśva mānī tiryak mānī ca yat kurutaḥ tat ubhayam karoti
catur aśrasya akṣṇayā rajjuḥ dvistavatīm bhūmim karoti

original: pramāṇaṃ tṛtīyena vardhayet tac caturthenātmacatustriṃśonena saviśeṣaḥ // ĀpŚus_1.6 //
analyzed: pramāṇam tṛtīyena vardhayet tat caturthena ātma catustriṃśa ūnena sa viśeṣaḥ

original: pramāṇamātrīṃ rajjum ubhayataḥ pāśāṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_1.7b //
analyzed: pramāṇa mātrīm rajjum ubhayatas pāśām karoti

original: madhye lakṣaṇam ardhamadhyamayoś ca pṛṣṭhyāyāṃ rajjum āyamya pāśayorlakṣaṇeṣviti
analyzed: madhye lakṣaṇam ardha madhyamayoḥ ca pṛṣṭhyāyām rajjum āyamya pāśayoḥ lakṣaṇeṣu iti

original: śaṅkūn nihaty upāntyayoḥ pāśau pratimucya madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nimittaṃ karoti /
analyzed: śaṅkūn nihati upāntyayoḥ pāśau pratimucya madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇā apāyamya śaṅkum nimittam karoti

original: uparyupari nimittaṃ madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṃsam āyacchet /
analyzed: upari upari nimittam madhyamena lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇam aṃsam āyacchet

original: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya madhyamenaiva lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet /
analyzed: unmucya pūrvasmāt aparasmin pratimucya madhyamena eva lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇām śroṇim āyacchet

original: pṛṣṭhyāntayor madhye ca śaṅkūn nihatyārdhe 'rdhe tadviśeṣam abhyasya lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvārdhamagamayet /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhya antayoḥ madhye ca śaṅkūn nihatya ardhe ṛdhe tad viśeṣam abhyasya lakṣaṇam kṛtvā ardham agamayet

original: antyayoḥ pāśau kṛtvā madhyame saviśeṣaṃ pratimucya pūrvasminn itaraṃ lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇamaṅkam āyacchet /
analyzed: antyayoḥ pāśau kṛtvā madhyame sa viśeṣam pratimucya pūrvasmin itaram lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇam aṅkam āyacchet

original: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya lakṣaṇenaiva dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim āyacchet /
analyzed: unmucya pūrvasmāt aparasmin pratimucya lakṣaṇena eva dakṣiṇām śroṇim āyacchet

original: pramāṇaṃ tiryag dvikaraṇy āyāmas tasyākṣṇayārajjus trikaraṇī // ĀpŚus_2.2 //
analyzed: pramāṇam tiryak dvi karaṇī āyāmaḥ tasya akṣṇayā rajjuḥ tri karaṇī

original: caturaśrāc caturaśraṃ nirjihīrṣan yāvan nirjihīrṣet tasya karaṇyā varṣīyaso vṛddhramullikhet // ĀpŚus_2.5a //
analyzed: caturaśrāt caturaśram nirjihīrṣan yāvat nirjihīrṣet tasya karaṇyā varṣīyasaḥ vṛddhram ullikhet

original: vṛrdhasya pārśvamānīm akṣṇayetarat pārśvam upasaṃharet // ĀpŚus_2.5b //
analyzed: vṛrdhasya pārśvamānīm akṣṇayā itarat pārśvam upasaṃharet

original: sā yatra nipatet tad apacchindyāt // ĀpŚus_2.5c //
upasaṃhṛtākṣaṇayārajjuḥ sā catuṣkaraṇī chinnā cetarā ca yat pṛthagbhūte kurutas tad ubhayaṃ karoti // ĀpŚus_2.6a //
analyzed: upasaṃhṛtā akṣaṇayā rajjuḥ sā catuṣkaraṇī chinnā ca itarā ca yat pṛthak bhūte kurutaḥ tat ubhayam karoti

original: dīrghacaturaśraṃ samacaturaśraṃ cikīrṣan tiryaṅmānyāpacchidya śeṣaṃ vibhajyobhayata upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_2.7a //
analyzed: dīrgha caturaśram sama caturaśram cikīrṣan tiryak mānya apacchidya śeṣam vibhajya ubhayatas upadadhyāt

original: samacaturaśraṃ dīrghacaturaśraṃ cukīrṣanā yāvaccikīrṣet tāvatīṃ pārśvamānīṃ kṛtvā yadadhikaṃ syād yathāyogam upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_3.1 //
analyzed: sama caturaśram dīrgha caturaśram cukīrṣanā yāvat cikīrṣet tāvatīm pārśvamānīm kṛtvā yat adhikam syāt yathāyogam upadadhyāt

original: caturaśraṃ maṇḍalaṃ cikīrṣan madhyāt koṭyāṃ nipātayet // ĀpŚus_3.2a //
analyzed: caturaśram maṇḍalam cikīrṣan madhyāt koṭyām nipātayet

original: pārśvataḥ parikṛṣyātiśayatṛtīyena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet // ĀpŚus_3.2b //
analyzed: pārśvatas parikṛṣya atiśaya tṛtīyena saha maṇḍalam parilikhet

original: maṇḍalaṃ caturaśraṃ cikīrṣan viṣkambhaṃ pañcadaśa bhāgān kṛtvā dvāv uddharet /
analyzed: maṇḍalam caturaśram cikīrṣan viṣkambham pañcadaśa bhāgān kṛtvā dvau uddharet

original: yāvatpramāṇā rajjus tāvatastāvato vargān karoti // ĀpŚus_3.8a //
analyzed: yāvat pramāṇā rajjuḥ tāvataḥ tāvataḥ vargān karoti
yāvatā yāvatā adhikena parilikhati tad pārśvayoḥ upadadhāti

original: yac ca tena caturaśraṃ kriyate tat koṭyām // ĀpŚus_3.9b //
analyzed: yat ca tena caturaśram kriyate tat koṭyām
ardhasya dvi pramāṇāyāḥ pāda pūraṇa tvāt

original: āgnyādheyike vihāre gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarāle vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_4.1a //
analyzed: āgnyādheyike vihāre gārhapatya āhavanīyayoḥ antarāle vijñāyate

original: caturviṃśatyām aparimite yāvatā vā cakṣuṣā manyate tasmān nātidūram ādheya iti sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa śrūyate // ĀpŚus_4.2 //
analyzed: caturviṃśatyām aparimite yāvatā vā cakṣuṣā manyate tasmāt na atidūram ādheyaḥ iti sarveṣām aviśeṣeṇa śrūyate

original: dakṣiṇataḥ purastād vitṛtīyadeśe gārhapatyasya nedīyasi dakṣiṇāgner vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_4.3 //
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas purastāt vitṛtīya deśe gārhapatyasya nedīyasi dakṣiṇāgneḥ vijñāyate

original: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antarālaṃ pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā vā saṃvibhajya ṣaṣṭhaṃ saptamaṃ vā
analyzed: gārhapatya āhavanīyayoḥ antarālam pañcadhā ṣaḍdhā vā saṃvibhajya ṣaṣṭham saptamam vā

original: bhāgam āgantum upasamasya samaṃ traidhaṃ vibhajyāparasmiṃs tṛtīye lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: bhāgam āgantum upasamasya samam traidham vibhajya aparasmin tṛtīye lakṣaṇam kṛtvā

original: gārhapatyāhavanīyayor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti tad
analyzed: gārhapatya āhavanīyayoḥ antau niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇā apāyamya nimittam karoti tat

original: yajamānamātrī prācy aparimitā vā yathāsannāni havīṃṣi saṃbhaved evaṃ tiraścī prāñcau vedyaṃsāv unnayati /
analyzed: yajamāna mātrī prācī aparimitā vā yathā āsannāni havīṃṣi saṃbhavet evam tiraścī prāñcau vedi aṃsau unnayati

original: pratīcī śroṇī purastād aṃhīyasī paścāt prathīyasī madhye saṃnatataraivam iva hi yoṣeti dārśikyā veder vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_4.5 //
analyzed: pratīcī śroṇī purastāt aṃhīyasī paścāt prathīyasī madhye saṃnatatarā evam iva hi yoṣā iti dārśikyāḥ vedeḥ vijñāyate

original: apareṇāhavanīyaṃ yajamānamātrī dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya tāvatīṃ rajjum āyamya madhye
analyzed: apareṇa āhavanīyam yajamāna mātrī dīrgham caturaśram vihṛtya tāvatīm rajjum āyamya madhye

original: lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇayoḥ śroṇyaṃsayor antarā niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇāpāyamya nimittaṃ karoti /
analyzed: lakṣaṇam kṛtvā dakṣiṇayoḥ śroṇi aṃsayoḥ antarā niyamya lakṣaṇena dakṣiṇā apāyamya nimittam karoti

original: tiryaṅmānīṃ dviguṇāṃ tathā kṛtvā paścāt purastāc copalikhet /
analyzed: tiryak mānīm dviguṇām tathā kṛtvā paścāt purastāt ca upalikhet

original: triṃśat padāni prakramā vā paścāttiraśvī bhavati /
analyzed: triṃśat padāni prakramāḥ vā paścāt tiraśvī bhavati

original: ṣaṭtriṃśat prācī caturviṃśatiḥ purastāt tiraścīti saumikyā veder vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_5.1 //
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśat prācī caturviṃśatiḥ purastāt tiraścī iti saumikyāḥ vedeḥ vijñāyate

original: ṣaṭtriṃśikāyām aṣṭādaśopasamasya aparasmād antād dvādaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ pañcadaśasu lakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: ṣaṭtriṃśikāyām aṣṭādaśa upasamasya aparasmāt antāt dvādaśasu lakṣaṇam pañcadaśasu lakṣaṇam

original: pṛṣṭhyāntayor antau niyamya pañcadaśakena dakṣiṇāpāyamya śaṅkuṃ nihantyevam uttarataḥśroṇī /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhya antayoḥ antau niyamya pañcadaśakena dakṣiṇā apāyamya śaṅkum nihanti evam uttaratas śroṇī
viparyasya aṃsau pañcadaśikena eva apāyamya dvādaśike śaṅkum nihanti

original: dakṣiṇasmād aṃsād dvādaśasu dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyāṃ nipātayet /
analyzed: dakṣiṇasmāt aṃsāt dvādaśasu dakṣiṇasyām śroṇyām nipātayet

original: saumikyā veditṛtīyadeśe yajeteti sautrāmaṇyā veder vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_5.8a //
analyzed: saumikyāḥ vedi tṛtīya deśe yajeta iti sautrāmaṇyāḥ vedeḥ vijñāyate

original: prakramāsya dvikaraṇī prakramasthānīyā bhavati trikaraṇyā vā // ĀpŚus_5.8b //
analyzed: prakramā asya dvi karaṇī prakrama sthānīyā bhavati tri karaṇyā vā

original: trīṇi caturviṃśāni padaśatāni sautrāmaṇikī vediḥ // ĀpŚus_5.9 //
analyzed: trīṇi caturviṃśāni pada śatāni sautrāmaṇikī vediḥ

original: dvistāvā vedir bhavatīty aśvamedhe vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_5.10 //
analyzed: dvistāvā vediḥ bhavati iti aśvamedhe vijñāyate
prakramasya dvi karaṇī prakama sthānīyā bhavati
prakramaḥ dvi padaḥ tri padaḥ vā
prakrame yāthākāmī śabda arthasya viśayi tvāt

original: eṣa hi ceṣṭānāṃ kartā bhavati // ĀpŚus_6.2b //
rathamātrī nirūḍhapaśubandhasya vedir bhavatīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_6.3a //
analyzed: ratha mātrī nirūḍhapaśubandhasya vediḥ bhavati iti vijñāyate

original: tasya khalvāhū rathākṣamātrī paścāt tiryag īṣayā prācī /
analyzed: tasya khalu āhuḥ ratha akṣa mātrī paścāt tiryak īṣayā prācī
pañcadaśikena eva apāyamya ardha akṣeṇa ardha yugena śroṇi aṃsān nirharet
aṣṭāśīti śatam īṣā tiryak akṣaḥ catuḥśatam

original: ṣaḍaśītiyugaṃ cāsya rathaścāraṇa ucyate iti rathaparimāṇam // ĀpŚus_6.5b //
analyzed: ṣaḍaśīti yugam ca asya rathaḥ cāraṇaḥ ucyate iti ratha parimāṇam

original: aratnibhir vā caturbhiḥ paścāt ṣaḍbhiḥ prācī tribhiḥ purastāt /
analyzed: aratnibhiḥ vā caturbhiḥ paścāt ṣaḍbhiḥ prācī tribhiḥ purastāt

original: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamya dvābhyām adhyardheneti śroṇyaṃsān nirharet // ĀpŚus_6.6 //
analyzed: tat eka rajjvā uktam pañcadaśikena eva apāyamya dvābhyām adhyardhena iti śroṇi aṃsān nirharet

original: yajamānamātrī catuḥsraktir bhavatīti paitṛkyā veder vijñāyate,
analyzed: yajamāna mātrī catur sraktiḥ bhavati iti paitṛkyāḥ vedeḥ vijñāyate

original: tadekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet // ĀpŚus_6.7 //
analyzed: tat eka rajjvā uktam pañcadaśikena eva apāyamya ardhena tatas śroṇi aṃsān nirharet
daśa pada uttarā vediḥ bhavati iti some vijñāyate

original: tad ekarajjvoktaṃ pañcadaśikenaivāpāyamyārdhena tataḥ śroṇyaṃsān nirharet // ĀpŚus_6.8 //
analyzed: tat eka rajjvā uktam pañcadaśikena eva apāyamya ardhena tatas śroṇi aṃsān nirharet

original: tāṃ yugena yajamānasya vā padair vimāya śamyayā parimimīte // ĀpŚus_6.9 //
analyzed: tām yugena yajamānasya vā padaiḥ vimāya śamyayā parimimīte

original: pade yuge 'ratnāv iyati śamyāyāṃ ca mānārtheṣu yathākāmī śabdārthasya viśayitvāt // ĀpŚus_6.10 //
analyzed: pade yuge ratnau iyati śamyāyām ca māna artheṣu yathākāmī śabda arthasya viśayi tvāt

original: navāratni tiryak saptaviṃśatir udag āyatam iti sadaso vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_7.1 //
analyzed: nava aratni tiryak saptaviṃśatiḥ udak āyatam iti sadasaḥ vijñāyate
tat eka rajjvā uktam pañcadaśikena eva apāyamya ardhapañcamaiḥ śroṇi aṃsān nirharet
prādeśa mukhāḥ prādeśa antarālāḥ bhavanti iti uparavāṇām vijñāyate

original: aratnimātraṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya sraktiṣu śaṅkūn nihatyārdhaprādeśena taṃ taṃ parilikhec chrutisāmarthyāt // ĀpŚus_7.4 //
analyzed: aratni mātram caturaśram vihṛtya sraktiṣu śaṅkūn nihatya ardha prādeśena tam tam parilikhet śruti sāmarthyāt
vyāyāma mātrī bhavati iti gārhapatya citeḥ vijñāyate

original: karaṇaṃ vyāyāmasya tṛtīyāyāmaṃ saptamavyāsaṃ kārayet // ĀpŚus_7.7 //
analyzed: karaṇam vyāyāmasya tṛtīya āyāmam saptama vyāsam kārayet
prāc āyāmāḥ prathame prastāre parasmin udak āyāmāḥ

original: maṇḍalāyāṃ mṛdo dehaṃ kṛtvā madhye śaṅkuṃ nihatyārdhavyāyāmena saha maṇḍalaṃ parilikhet // ĀpŚus_7.10a //
analyzed: maṇḍalāyām mṛdaḥ deham kṛtvā madhye śaṅkum nihatya ardha vyāyāmena saha maṇḍalam parilikhet

original: tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvat sambhavet tan navadhā vyavalikhya traidham ekaikaṃ pradhikaṃ vibhajet // ĀpŚus_7.10b //
analyzed: tasmin caturaśram avadadhyāt yāvat sambhavet tat navadhā vyavalikhya traidham ekaikam pradhikam vibhajet

original: upadhāne caturaśrasyāvāntaradeśān prati sraktīḥ sampādayet // ĀpŚus_7.11a //
analyzed: upadhāne catur aśrasya avāntaradeśān prati sraktīḥ sampādayet

original: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_7.11c //

analyzed: piśīla mātrāḥ bhavanti iti dhiṣṇyānām vijñāyate
caturaśrāḥ iti ekeṣām parimaṇḍalāḥ iti ekeṣām
mṛdaḥ dehān kṛtvā āgnīdhrīyam navadhā vyavalikhya

original: yathāsaṅkhyam itarā vyavalikhya yathāyogam upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_7.15 //
bhavatīva khalu vā eṣa yo 'gniṃ cinute iti vijñāyate /
analyzed: bhavati iva khalu vai eṣa yaḥ gnim cinute iti vijñāyate

original: vayasāṃ vā eṣa pratimayā cīyata ityākṛticodanāt /
analyzed: vayasām vai eṣa pratimayā cīyate iti ākṛti codanāt

original: yāvadāmnānena veṇunā caturaśre ātmani puruṣān avamimote // ĀpŚus_8.2a //
analyzed: yāvat āmnānena veṇunā caturaśre ātmani puruṣān avamima ute

original: puruṣaṃ dakṣiṇe pakṣe puruṣaṃ pucche puruṣam uttare // ĀpŚus_8.2b //
analyzed: puruṣam dakṣiṇe pakṣe puruṣam pucche puruṣam uttare

original: ekavidhaḥ prathamo 'gnir dvividho dvitīyas trividhas tṛtīyaḥ ta evam evodyantyaikaśatavidhāt // ĀpŚus_8.3 //
analyzed: ekavidhaḥ prathamaḥ gniḥ dvividhaḥ dvitīyaḥ trividhaḥ tṛtīyaḥ te evam eva udyantya ekaśatavidhāt

original: tad u ha vai saptavidham eva cinvīta /
analyzed: tat u ha vai saptavidham eva cinvīta

original: tata ūrdhvam ekottarān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_8.4 //
analyzed: tatas ūrdhvam eka uttarān iti vijñāyate
ekavidha prabhṛtīnām na pakṣa pucchāni bhavanti
saptavidha vākyaśeṣa tvāt śruti vipratiṣedhāt ca

original: aṣṭavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ yad anyat saptabhyas tat saptadhā vibhajya pratipuruṣam āveśayet // ĀpŚus_8.6a //
analyzed: aṣṭavidha prabhṛtīnām yat anyat saptabhyaḥ tat saptadhā vibhajya pratipuruṣam āveśayet

original: yāvān yajamāna ūrdhvabāhus tāvad antarāle veṇoś chidre karoti madhye tṛtīyam // ĀpŚus_8.8 //
analyzed: yāvān yajamānaḥ ūrdhva bāhuḥ tāvat antarāle veṇoḥ chidre karoti madhye tṛtīyam

original: apareṇa yūpāvaṭadeśam anupṛṣṭhyaṃ veṇuṃ nidhāya chidreṣu śaṅkūn nihatyonmucyāparābhyāṃ dakṣiṇāprāk parilikhed āntāt // ĀpŚus_8.9 //
analyzed: apareṇa yūpa avaṭa deśam anu pṛṣṭhyam veṇum nidhāya chidreṣu śaṅkūn nihatya unmucya aparābhyām dakṣiṇā prāk parilikhet ā antāt

original: unmucya pūrvasmād aparasmin pratimucya dakṣiṇā pratyakparilikhed āntāt // ĀpŚus_8.10 //
analyzed: unmucya pūrvasmāt aparasmin pratimucya dakṣiṇā pratyak parilikhet ā antāt

original: unmucya veṇuṃ madhyame śaṅkāv antyaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucyoparyupari lekhāsamaraṃ
analyzed: unmucya veṇum madhyame śaṅkau antyam veṇoḥ chidram pratimucya upari upari lekhā samaram

original: dakṣiṇā veṇuṃ nidhāyāntye chidre śaṅkuṃ nihatya tasmin madhyamaṃ veṇoś chidraṃ pratimucya
analyzed: dakṣiṇā veṇum nidhāya antye chidre śaṅkum nihatya tasmin madhyamam veṇoḥ chidram pratimucya

original: lekhāntayor itare pratiṣṭhāpya chidrayoḥ śaṅkū nihanti // ĀpŚus_9.1a //
analyzed: lekhā antayoḥ itare pratiṣṭhāpya chidrayoḥ śaṅkū nihanti

original: evaṃ puradakṣiṇaṃ catura ātmani puruṣānavamimīte // ĀpŚus_9.2a //
analyzed: evam pura dakṣiṇam caturaḥ ātmani puruṣān avamimīte

original: aratninā dakṣiṇato dakṣiṇam ity uktam // ĀpŚus_9.2c //
pṛṣṭhyāto vā puruṣamātrasyākṣṇayā veṇuṃ nidhāya pūrvasminn itaram /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhyātaḥ vā puruṣa mātrasya akṣṇayā veṇum nidhāya pūrvasmin itaram

original: rajjvā vā vimāyottaravedinyāyena veṇunā vimimīte // ĀpŚus_9.4 //
analyzed: rajjvā vā vimāya uttaravedi nyāyena veṇunā vimimīte

original: sapakṣapuccheṣu vidhābhyāse 'pacaye ca vidhāsaptamakaraṇīṃ puruṣasthānīyāṃ kṛtvā viharet // ĀpŚus_9.5 //
analyzed: sa pakṣa puccheṣu vidhā abhyāse pacaye ca vidhā saptama karaṇīm puruṣa sthānīyām kṛtvā viharet
tāsām eva ekatas dhī ardhāḥ tat dvitīyam

original: puruṣasya pañcamo bhāga ekataḥ prādeśa ekataḥ tat tṛtīyam // ĀpŚus_9.6b //
analyzed: puruṣasya pañcamaḥ bhāgaḥ ekatas prādeśaḥ ekatas tat tṛtīyam
sama caturaśrāḥ pañcadaśa bhāgīyāḥ tat pañcamam

original: ūrvdhvapramāṇamiṣṭakānāṃ jānoḥ jānoḥ pañcamena kārayet // ĀpŚus_9.7a //
analyzed: ūrvdhva pramāṇam iṣṭakānām jānoḥ jānoḥ pañcamena kārayet

original: yat pacyamānānāṃ pratihrasīta purīṣeṇa tat sampūrayed aniyataparimāṇatvāt purīṣasya // ĀpŚus_9.8 //
analyzed: yat pacyamānānām pratihrasīta purīṣeṇa tat sampūrayet aniyata parimāṇa tvāt purīṣasya

original: upadhāne 'dhyardhā daśa purastāt pratīcīr ātmany upadadhāti /
analyzed: upadhāne dhi ardhāḥ daśa purastāt pratīcīḥ ātmani upadadhāti

original: pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayās tāsām ardheṣṭakāmātrāṇi pakṣayor bhavanti // ĀpŚus_10.1b //
analyzed: pakṣa apyayayoḥ ca viśayāḥ tāsām ardha iṣṭakā mātrāṇi pakṣayoḥ bhavanti

original: pañcapañca pucchapārśvayor dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_10.1c //
analyzed: pañca pañca puccha pārśvayoḥ dakṣiṇāḥ udīcīḥ ca

original: pucche prādeśam upadhāya sarvam agniṃ pañcamabhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet // ĀpŚus_10.2 //
analyzed: pucche prādeśam upadhāya sarvam agnim pañcamabhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet

original: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā daśa dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāti /
analyzed: aparasmin prastāre dhi ardhāḥ daśa dakṣiṇatas udīcīḥ ātmani upadadhāti

original: yathā prathame prastāre pakṣau tathā puccham /
analyzed: yathā prathame prastāre pakṣau tathā puccham

original: yathā pucchaṃ tathā pakṣau viparītā apyaye // ĀpŚus_10.4b //
analyzed: yathā puccham tathā pakṣau viparītāḥ apyaye

original: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_10.6b //
pañcabhiḥ purīṣair abhyūhatīti purīṣāntā citir arthāntaratvāt purīṣasya // ĀpŚus_10.7 //
analyzed: pañcabhiḥ purīṣaiḥ abhyūhati iti purīṣa antā citiḥ artha antara tvāt purīṣasya

original: jānudaghnīṃ sāhasraṃ cinvīta prathamaṃ cinvānaḥ // ĀpŚus_10.8a //
analyzed: jānu daghnīm sāhasram cinvīta prathamam cinvānaḥ

original: nābhidaghnīṃ dviṣāhasraṃ dvitīyam āsyadaghnīṃ triṣāhasraṃ tṛtīyam uttaram uttaraṃ jyāyāmsam // ĀpŚus_10.8b //
analyzed: nābhi daghnīm dviṣāhasram dvitīyam āsya daghnīm triṣāhasram tṛtīyam uttaram uttaram jyāyāmsam

original: mahāntaṃ bṛhantam aparimitaṃ svargakāmaś cinvīteti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_10.8c //
analyzed: mahāntam bṛhantam aparimitam svarga kāmaḥ cinvīta iti vijñāyate
dvi sāhasre dvi prastārāḥ citayaḥ bhavanti

original: triṣāhasra triprastārāś caturthaprabhṛtiṣv āhāreṣu nityam iṣṭakāparimāṇam // ĀpŚus_10.9 //
analyzed: triṣāhasra tri prastārāḥ caturtha prabhṛtiṣu āhāreṣu nityam iṣṭakā parimāṇam

original: vijñāyate ca ḥna jyāyāṃsaṃ citvā kanīyāṃsaṃ cinvīteti' // ĀpŚus_10.10 //
analyzed: vijñāyate ca ḥna jyāyāṃsam citvā kanīyāṃsam cinvīta iti

original: pādamātrayo bhavanti aratnimātrayo bhavanty ūrvasthimātrayo bhavanty aṇūkamātrayo bhavantīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_11.2 //
analyzed: pāda mātrayaḥ bhavanti aratni mātrayaḥ bhavanti ūru asthi mātrayaḥ bhavanti aṇūka mātrayaḥ bhavanti iti vijñāyate
tatra yathākāmī śabda arthasya viśayi tvāt
upadhāne ṣṭau aṣṭau pādeṣṭakāḥ caturbhāgīyānām pakṣa agrayoḥ nidadhyāt

original: sandhyoś ca tadvad ātmānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgulāpetāḥ // ĀpŚus_11.5a //
analyzed: sandhyoḥ ca tadvat ātmānam ṣaṣ aṅgula apetāḥ

original: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīciś ca // ĀpŚus_11.5b //
analyzed: śroṇi aṃseṣu ca aṣṭau prācīḥ pratīciḥ ca

original: pucche prādeśamupadhāya sarvam agniṃ caturbhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet // ĀpŚus_11.7 //
analyzed: pucche prādeśam upadhāya sarvam agnim caturbhāgīyābhiḥ pracchādayet

original: aparasmin prastāre pucchāpyaye pañcamabhāgīyā viśayāḥ // ĀpŚus_11.9a //
analyzed: aparasmin prastāre puccha apyaye pañcamabhāgīyāḥ viśayāḥ

original: tā ātmani caturdaśabhiḥ pādair yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_11.9b //
analyzed: tāḥ ātmani caturdaśabhiḥ pādaiḥ yathāyogam paryupadadhyāt

original: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_11.11b //
ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ karaṇīnāṃ dvādaśena trayodaśenetīṣṭakāḥ kārayet // ĀpŚus_12.1a //
analyzed: ekavidha prabhṛtīnām karaṇīnām dvādaśena trayodaśena iti iṣṭakāḥ kārayet

original: pādeṣṭakāś ca vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_12.1b //
analyzed: pāda iṣṭakāḥ ca vyatyāsam cinuyāt yāvataḥ prastārān cikīrṣet

original: ekavidhaprabhṛtīnāṃ prathamāhāreṇa dvitīyena tṛtīyeneti yo yujyeta /
analyzed: ekavidha prabhṛtīnām prathama āhāreṇa dvitīyena tṛtīyena iti yaḥ yujyeta
sarveṣām yathā śruti saṅkhyā tathā ūrdhva pramāṇam
kāmyāḥ guṇa vikārāḥ guṇa śāstra tvāt

original: praugacitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_12.4 //
analyzed: prauga citam cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate

original: yāvānagniḥ sāratniprādeśo dvistāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ caturaśrāṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāc chroṇīṃ pratyālikhet /
analyzed: yāvān agniḥ sa aratni prādeśaḥ dvis tāvatīm bhūmim caturaśrām kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyāḥ ardhāt śroṇīm pratyālikhet

original: ubhayayaḥ praugaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta prajātān bhrātṛvyān nudeya pratijaniṣyamāṇān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_12.7 //
analyzed: ubhayayas praugam cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta prajātān bhrātṛvyān nudeya pratijaniṣyamāṇān iti vijñāyate

original: tāvad eva tīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya pūrvāparayoḥ karaṇyor ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet /
analyzed: tāvat eva tīrgham caturaśram vihṛtya pūrva aparayoḥ karaṇyoḥ ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇa uttarayoḥ nipātayet

original: rathacakracitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_12.11 //
analyzed: ratha cakra citam cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate

original: yāvān agniḥ sāratniprādeśas tāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ parimaṇḍalāṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃś caturaśram avadadhyād yāvatsambhavet // ĀpŚus_12.12 //
analyzed: yāvān agniḥ sa aratni prādeśaḥ tāvatīm bhūmim parimaṇḍalām kṛtvā tasmin caturaśram avadadhyāt yāvat sambhavet

original: tāsāṃ ṣaṭ pradhāv upadhāya śeṣam aṣṭadhā vibhajet // ĀpŚus_13.2 //
analyzed: tāsām ṣaḍ pradhau upadhāya śeṣam aṣṭadhā vibhajet
upadhāne catur aśrasya avāntaradeśān prati sraktīḥ sampādayet

original: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_13.3 //

analyzed: droṇa citam cinvīta anna kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate
tatra yathākāmī śabda arthasya viśayi tvāt

original: paścāt tsarur bhavaty anurūpatvāyeti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_13.9 //
analyzed: paścāt tsaruḥ bhavati anurūpa tvāya iti vijñāyate

original: sarvasyā bhūmer daśamaṃ tsarus tasya pucchena nirhāra uktaḥ // ĀpŚus_13.10 //
analyzed: sarvasyāḥ bhūmeḥ daśamam tsaruḥ tasya pucchena nirhāraḥ uktaḥ
upadhāne dhi ardhāḥ purastāt pratīcīḥ ātmani upadadhāti

original: aparasmin prastāre 'dhyardhā dakṣiṇata udīcīr ātmany upadadhāty uttarataś ca dakṣiṇās tsarupārśvayor dakṣiṇā utīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_13.15 //
analyzed: aparasmin prastāre dhyardhāḥ dakṣiṇatas udīcīḥ ātmani upadadhāti uttaratas ca dakṣiṇāḥ tsaru pārśvayoḥ dakṣiṇāḥ utīcīḥ ca

original: samūhyaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.1 //
analyzed: samūhyam cinvīta paśu kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate

original: paricāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.4 //
analyzed: paricāyyam cinvīta grāma kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate
madhyamām svayamātṛṇṇām pradakṣiṇam iṣṭakā gaṇaiḥ paricinoti

original: upacāyyaṃ cinvīta grāmakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.6 //
analyzed: upacāyyam cinvīta grāma kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate

original: śmaśānacitaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayet pitṛloka ṛdhnuyāmiti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.8 //
analyzed: śmaśāna citam cinvīta yaḥ kāmayet pitṛ loke ṛdhnuyām iti vijñāyate

original: dvayāni khalu śmamaśānāni caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca // ĀpŚus_14.9 //
analyzed: dvayāni khalu śma maśānāni caturaśrāṇi parimaṇḍalāni ca
tatra yathākāmī śabda arthasya viśayi tvāt

original: chandaścitaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_14.13 //
analyzed: chandaḥ citam cinvīta paśu kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate

original: śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_15.1 //
analyzed: śyena citam cinvīta suvarga kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate

original: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_15.2b //
analyzed: evam iva hi vayasām madhye pakṣa nirṇāmaḥ bhavati iti vijñāyate
yāvān agniḥ sa aratni prādeśaḥ saptavidhaḥ saṃpadyate
prādeśam caturtham ātmanaḥ caturbhāgīyāḥ ca aṣṭau

original: tāsāṃ tisraḥ śira itarat pakṣayor vibhajet // ĀpŚus_15.3 //
analyzed: tāsām tisraḥ śiraḥ itarat pakṣayoḥ vibhajet

original: ardhadaśamā aratnayo 'ṅgulayaś ca caturbhāgonāḥ pakṣāyāmaḥ // ĀpŚus_15.5 //
analyzed: ardha daśamāḥ aratnayaḥ ṅgulayaḥ ca catur bhāga ūnāḥ pakṣa āyāmaḥ
dvi puruṣām rajjum ubhayatas pāśām karoti

original: pakṣasyāparayoḥ koṭyor antau niyamya lakṣaṇena prācīnam āyacched evaṃ purastāt /
analyzed: pakṣasya aparayoḥ koṭyoḥ antau niyamya lakṣaṇena prācīnam āyacchet evam purastāt
ātmā dvi puruṣa āyāmaḥ dhi ardha puruṣa vyāsaḥ
pucche rdha puruṣa vyāsam puruṣam pratīcīnam āyacchet

original: śirasy ardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇayor nipātayet // ĀpŚus_15.10 //
analyzed: śirasi ardha puruṣeṇa caturaśram kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyāḥ ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇayoḥ nipātayet

original: karaṇaṃ puruṣasya pañcamāyāmaṃ ṣaṣṭhavyāsaṃ kārayed yathāyoganataṃ tatprathamam // ĀpŚus_16.2 //
analyzed: karaṇam puruṣasya pañcama āyāmam ṣaṣṭha vyāsam kārayet yathā yoga natam tat prathamam
puruṣasya pañcama bhāgam daśa bhāga vyāsam pratīcīnam āyacchet

original: evamanyat / uttaraṃ tūttarasyāḥ koṭyālikhet tad aṣṭamam // ĀpŚus_16.9 //
analyzed: evam anyat uttaram tu uttarasyāḥ koṭyā ālikhet tat aṣṭamam
catur bhāgīya akṣṇayā ubhayatas bhedaḥ navamam

original: upadhāne ṣaṣṭiḥṣaṣṭiḥ pakṣayoḥ prathamā udīcīrnir upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_16.11 //
analyzed: upadhāne ṣaṣṭiḥ ṣaṣṭiḥ pakṣayoḥ prathamāḥ udīcīḥ niḥ upadadhyāt

original: pucchapārśvayor aṣṭāvaṣṭau ṣaṭhyayas tisro 'gre tata ekān tatas tisraḥ tata ekā // ĀpŚus_16.12 //
analyzed: puccha pārśvayoḥ aṣṭau aṣṭau tisraḥ gre tatas ekān tatas tisraḥ tatas ekā

original: tayos tu paścāt pañcamyāv anīkasaṃhite // ĀpŚus_16.12 //
analyzed: tayoḥ tu paścāt pañcamyau anīka saṃhite

original: śeṣe daśa caturthyaḥ śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau prācīḥ pratīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_17.1 //
analyzed: śeṣe daśa caturthyaḥ śroṇi aṃseṣu ca aṣṭau prācīḥ pratīcīḥ ca

original: śeṣe ca ṣaḍviṃśatir aṣṭau ṣaṣṭayaś catasraḥ pañcamyaḥ // ĀpŚus_17.2 //
analyzed: śeṣe ca ṣaḍviṃśatiḥ aṣṭau ṣaṣṭayaḥ catasraḥ pañcamyaḥ
aparasmin prastāre pañca pañca nirṇāmayoḥ dvitīyāḥ

original: apyayayoś ca tṛtīyā ātmānam aṣṭabhāgāvetāḥ // ĀpŚus_17.5a //
analyzed: apyayayoḥ ca tṛtīyāḥ ātmānam aṣṭa bhāgau etāḥ
dvitīya caturthoḥ ca anyataratas pratisaṃhitām ekaikām

original: śroṇyaṃseṣu cāṣṭau caturthyo dakṣiṇā udīcīś ca // ĀpŚus_17.7a //
analyzed: śroṇi aṃseṣu ca aṣṭau caturthyaḥ dakṣiṇāḥ udīcīḥ ca

original: śeṣe ca viṃśatis triṃśat ṣaṣṭhayaḥ ekāṃ pañcamīm // ĀpŚus_17.7b //
analyzed: śeṣe ca viṃśatiḥ triṃśat ṣaṣṭhayaḥ ekām pañcamīm

original: śirasi caturthyau tayoś ca purastāccatasro navamyaḥ // ĀpŚus_17.8 //
analyzed: śirasi caturthyau tayoḥ ca purastāt catasraḥ navamyaḥ

original: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_17.10 //
śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_18.1 //
analyzed: śyena citam cinvīta suvarga kāmaḥ iti vijñāyate

original: evam iva hi vayasāṃ madhye pakṣanirṇāmo bhavatīti vijñāyate // ĀpŚus_18.2 //
analyzed: evam iva hi vayasām madhye pakṣa nirṇāmaḥ bhavati iti vijñāyate

original: puruṣasya ṣoḍaśabhir viṃśaṃ śataṃ sāratniprādeśaḥ saptavidhaḥ saṃpadyate /
analyzed: puruṣasya ṣoḍaśabhiḥ viṃśam śatam sa aratni prādeśaḥ saptavidhaḥ saṃpadyate

original: tāsāṃ catvāriṃśadātmani tisraḥ śirasi pañcadaśa puccha ekatriṃśad dakṣiṇe pakṣe tathottare // ĀpŚus_18.3 //
analyzed: tāsām catvāriṃśat ātmani tisraḥ śirasi pañcadaśa pucche ekatriṃśat dakṣiṇe pakṣe tathā uttare

original: adhyardhapuruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmata iti dīrghaṃ caturaśraṃ vihṛtya śroṇyaṃsebhyo dve dve ṣoḍasyau nirasyet /
analyzed: adhyardha puruṣaḥ tiryak dvau āyāmataḥ iti dīrgham caturaśram vihṛtya śroṇi aṃsebhyaḥ dve dve ṣoḍasyau nirasyet

original: śirasyardhapuruṣeṇa caturaśraṃ kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyā ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇottarayor nipātayet // ĀpŚus_18.5a //
analyzed: śirasi ardha puruṣeṇa caturaśram kṛtvā pūrvasyāḥ karaṇyāḥ ardhāt tāvati dakṣiṇa uttarayoḥ nipātayet

original: puruṣas tiryag dvāv āyāmataḥ ṣoḍaśabhāgaś ca dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ tiryak dvau āyāmataḥ ṣoḍaśa bhāgaḥ ca dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: pakṣāgrepakṣāgre puruṣacaturthena catvāri caturaśrāṇi kṛtvā tāny akṣṇayā vyavalikhyārdhāni nirasyet /
analyzed: pakṣa agre pakṣa agre puruṣa caturthena catvāri caturaśrāṇi kṛtvā tāni akṣṇayā vyavalikhya ardhāni nirasyet

original: pakṣāgram utsṛjya madhye pakṣasya prācīṃ lekhām ālikhet // ĀpŚus_18.8a //
analyzed: pakṣa agram utsṛjya madhye pakṣasya prācīm lekhām ālikhet

original: pakṣāpyaye puruṣaṃ niyamya lekhāyāṃ puruṣānte nitodantukuryāt /
analyzed: pakṣa apyaye puruṣam niyamya lekhāyām puruṣa ante

original: nitodāt prācīnaṃ puruṣānte nitodaṃ nitodayor nānāntāv ālikhet /
analyzed: nitodāt prācīnam puruṣa ante nitodam nitodayoḥ nānā antau ālikhet

original: dvipuruṣaṃ pascādardhapuruṣaṃ purastāc caturbhāgonaḥ puruṣa āyāmo 'ṣṭādaśakaraṇyo pārśvayos tāḥ pañcadaśaparigṛhṇanti /
analyzed: dvi puruṣam pascāt ardha puruṣam purastāt caturbhāga ūnaḥ puruṣaḥ pārśvayoḥ tāḥ pañcadaśa parigṛhṇanti

original: aṣṭamena tribhir aṣṭamaiś caturthena caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti // ĀpŚus_19.2b //
analyzed: aṣṭamena tribhiḥ aṣṭamaiḥ caturthena caturtha sa viśeṣeṇa iti

original: ardheṣṭakāṃ tribhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ caturthasaviśeṣeṇeti // ĀpŚus_19.3 //
analyzed: ardheṣṭakām tribhiḥ dvābhyām caturthābhyām caturtha sa viśeṣeṇa iti

original: pādeṣṭakāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaviśeṣārdhābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.4 //
analyzed: pāda iṣṭakām tribhiḥ caturthena ekam caturtha sa viśeṣa ardhābhyām ca iti

original: pakṣeṣṭakāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.5 //
analyzed: pakṣa iṣṭakām caturbhiḥ dvābhyām caturthābhyām dvisaptamābhyām ca iti

original: pakṣamadhyīyāṃ caturbhir dvābhyāṃ caturthābhyāṃ dvisaptamābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.6 //
analyzed: pakṣamadhyīyām caturbhiḥ dvābhyām caturthābhyām dvisaptamābhyām ca iti

original: pakṣāgrīyāṃ tribhiś caturthenaikaṃ caturthasaptamābhyām ekaṃ caturthasaviśeṣasaptamābhyāṃ ceti // ĀpŚus_19.7 //
analyzed: pakṣa agrīyām tribhiḥ caturthena ekam caturtha saptamābhyām ekam caturtha saviśeṣa saptamābhyām ca iti

original: apareṇaikādaśa pūrveṇa pucchāpyayaṃ pañcāpareṇa pañca pañcadaśa pucchāgre // ĀpŚus_19.9 //
analyzed: apareṇa ekādaśa pūrveṇa puccha apyayam pañca apareṇa pañca pañcadaśa puccha agre

original: catasraścatasraḥ pakṣāgrīyāḥ pakṣāgrayoḥ pakṣāpyayayoś ca viśayāḥ // ĀpŚus_20.1 //
analyzed: catasraḥ catasraḥ pakṣāgrīyāḥ pakṣāgrayoḥ pakṣa apyayayoḥ ca viśayāḥ

original: tā ātmani catasṛbhiś catasṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśībhir yathāyogaṃ paryupadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_20.2 //
analyzed: tāḥ ātmani catasṛbhiḥ catasṛbhiḥ ṣoḍaśībhiḥ yathāyogam paryupadadhyāt

original: aparasmin prastāre purastāc chirasi dve ṣoḍaśyau bāhyaviśeṣe upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_20.6a //
analyzed: aparasmin prastāre purastāt śirasi dve ṣoḍaśyau bāhya viśeṣe upadadhyāt
te pareṇa dve viśaye abhyantara viśeṣe

original: ātmanaḥ karaṇīnāṃ sandhiṣu ṣoḍaśyo bāhyaviśeṣā upadadhyāt // ĀpŚus_20.8 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ karaṇīnām sandhiṣu ṣoḍaśyaḥ bāhya viśeṣāḥ upadadhyāt

original: yac caturaśraṃ tryaśraṃ vā saṃpadyetārdheṣṭakābhiḥ pādeṣṭakābhir vā pracchādayet // ĀpŚus_20.12 //
analyzed: yat catur aśram tri aśram vā saṃpadyeta ardha iṣṭakābhiḥ pāda iṣṭakābhiḥ vā pracchādayet

original: vyatyāsaṃ cinuyād yāvataḥ prastārāṃś cikīrṣet // ĀpŚus_20.14 //
kaṅkacid alajacid iti śyenacitā vyākhyātau // ĀpŚus_21.1 //
analyzed: kaṅka cit alaja cit iti śyena citā vyākhyātau

original: evami va hi śyenasya varṣīyāṃsau pakṣau pucchād vakrau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ dīrgha ātmā maṇḍalaṃ śiraś ca /
analyzed: evami va hi śyenasya varṣīyāṃsau pakṣau pucchāt vakrau saṃnatam puccham dīrghaḥ ātmā maṇḍalam śiraḥ ca

original: jñāyate ca / kaṅkacitaṃ śīrṣaṇvantaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta saśīrṣo 'muṣmiṃl loke saṃbhaveyam iti vidyamāne kathaṃ brūyāt // ĀpŚus_21.3 //
analyzed: jñāyate ca kaṅka citam śīrṣaṇvantam cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta sa śīrṣaḥ muṣmin loke saṃbhaveyam iti vidyamāne katham brūyāt

original: prākṛtau vakrau pakṣau saṃnataṃ pucchaṃ vikāraśravaṇāt // ĀpŚus_21.4a //
analyzed: prākṛtau vakrau pakṣau saṃnatam puccham vikāra śravaṇāt
yathā u etat śeyana citam cinvīta iti
tristāvaḥ gniḥ bhavati iti aśvamedhe vijñāyate

original: dīrghacaturaśrāṇāṃ samāsena pakṣapucchānāṃ samāsa uktaḥ // ĀpŚus_21.8 //
analyzed: dīrgha caturaśrāṇām samāsena pakṣa pucchānām samāsaḥ uktaḥ
ekaviṃśaḥ gniḥ bhavati iti aśvamedhe vijñāyate

original: tatra puruṣābhyāso nāratniprādeśānāṃ saṅkhyāsaṃyogāt saṅkhyāsaṃyogāt // ĀpŚus_21.10 //
analyzed: tatra puruṣa abhyāsaḥ na aratni prādeśānām saṅkhyā saṃyogāt saṅkhyā saṃyogāt
